shortDescription: Swipe at and grasp shape, on tummy and one hand
longDescription: {0} is on their tummy, with one hand supporting themself. Place a shape near {0}'s other hand. {0} is able to grasp the shape for less than a second.

shortDescription: Hear cups and move head, seated independently
longDescription: {0} is seated independently. Knock two cups together quickly and loudly, allowing {0} to see the motions and hear the sounds. {0} is able to move their head actively in reaction.
{0} is holding onto two shapes. {0} is able to grasp and hold a third shape for a few seconds. May drop one of the existing shapes.

shortDescription: Crawl toward shape, swipe at and touch
longDescription: {0} is able to crawl toward a shape, swipe at and touch it.
{0} is holding a shape with one or two hands. {0} is able to put the shape on the ground, as a controlled release.

shortDescription: Grasp and release shape into bucket
longDescription: {0} is holding a shape with one or two hands. {0} is able to put the shape into the bucket, as a controlled release.

shortDescription: Find hidden cup in upward bucket
longDescription: Hide a cup inside an upward-facing bucket. {0} is able to find the cup in the bucket.

shortDescription: Find hidden cup in downward bucket
longDescription: Hide a cup inside a downward-facing bucket. {0} is able to find the cup in the bucket.

shortDescription: Find hidden shape in two upward cups
longDescription: Hide a shape in one of two upward-facing cups. {0} is able to find the shape.

shortDescription: Find hidden shape in two downward cups
longDescription: Hide a shape in one of two downward-facing cups. {0} is able to find the shape.

shortDescription: Go from sitting to on tummy
longDescription: {0} is able to go from sitting to on their tummy.

shortDescription: Go from any position to sitting
longDescription: {0} is able to go from any position to sitting.

shortDescription: Step up and down in place, in a standing posture and somewhat supported
longDescription: {0} is in a standing posture and somewhat supported (e.g. holding on to you). {0} is able to step and down in place.

shortDescription: Go from any position to standing posture, supported by furniture
longDescription: {0} is able to go from any position to a standing posture that is supported by holding on to furniture.

shortDescription: Bend wrist to turn hand slightly upward
longDescription: {0} is able to bend their wrist to turn their hand slightly upward.
